name: Traum-Ferienwohnung Wechselberger
description:
You fancy a winter ski hiking or biking holiday in the beautiful Zillertal and want neither to the ski lift, yet go far for cycling / walking / driving? Then you are in our house right!
Our house is located in close proximity to the Horberg / ski area Zillertal 3000
(within walking distance in 5 minutes).
Furthermore, two ski-bus stations and the Zillertal bike and hiking trail started around 100 metersaway from the house. There are also abeautiful, large children playground.
We offer 2 apartments, our great "dream apartment" on the 1st floor of our house and our "Small but nice apartment" in out-built basement area with large daylight window.

1. Big Dreams APARTMENT:
Directly below your 5-bedroom apartments with possibility of an additional 6 rooms (mini-apartment) runs in the winter cross-country skiing, which is partly lit up at night. In summer you can watch from your covered balcony the paragliders and hanggliders landing or leaning back in chair and enjoy your Holiday. 
The kitchen
Large kitchen, dining table for up to 14 people, fridge / freezer, dishwasher, stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, toaster, all crockery, tea towels.

Living room NEW !!!!
The new living / bedroom offers a large double bed, 3 beds are equipped with proper mattresses and which therefore can be availed as beds, flat screen TV. Plenty of space for children to play. Access to the covered terrace with fabulous views.

Bedroom I
Double bed, flat screen TV

Bedroom II
Bunk bed, lower bed part 140x200

Bedroom III
Double bed, 2 single beds, flat screen TV

Bathroom
Equipped with double sink, 2 showers, toilet, bidet, additional you have in your apartment a second, separate toilet

Balcony
With table, garden chairs and cushions, Aspect South East
Furthermore, our mini-apartment in the basement area built out (living room, bathroom) can be rented as needed / available capacity yet.


2. SMALL BUT BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT with 25-30 m²:
Here you will find:
A small fully equipped kitchenette with dining area. The kitchen is equipped with a Cerankochfelt, oven, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave, kettle, coffee maker and plenty of dishes. Dishtowels.
A cozy couch corner with flatscreen TV. The couch can be quickly converted if necessary into a single bed with an excellent sleeping comfort through a proper mattress.
Furthermore, the living room offers a double bed in extra length (180x210) and a separated bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.
At the entrance to your little vacation home there is a cloakroom and storage space for skis, snowboards, boots, ... ..

final cleaning big appartement in Winter-season € 80,-- in other time 60,-- Euro
Little Appartement 30,-- all the year. 

W-lan / WIFI, bedlinen, towel, heating, parking, water and current is all inclusive

way-description:
motorway-exit Zillertal, about 30 km straight ahead to Ramsau, pass the traffik lights in Ramsau and drive straight ahead to the rotary. Past Christophorus Reisen you have to turn right, straigt ahead and at the next rotary left,  pass Pizzeria Sidan, our house is on the left side (orange building), nr. 298.

image.caption: NEUES !!! Wohnzimmer mit Blick ins Zillertal

makesOffer.description: 135m², for 12 persons, near the "Horbergbahn", balkony, non smoking appartement

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
We offer a studio, 30 m² big, new, non smoking, for 1-3 persons, 5 minutes away by feed from the skilift Horbergbahn, ski-aeria Zillertal 3000. In the Studio you find: 
1 large living room with fully equipped kitchen, dishwascher, microwafe, oven, vitroceramik. 
flat-TV, double bed, single bed / couch, 
bathroom with shower + toilet
Lovingly decorated, W-lan / WIFI is free
Parking place for 1 car
Skishoewarmer
Apartment is located in the basement of our house built out large daylight window.
